subject: PM-1: Implement function-based headerProps with MotionProgress
description:
Update palette-mobile Tabs2 to support headerProps as a function that receives MotionProgress:
- Update TabsWithHeader.tsx to accept `headerProps?: HeaderProps | ((motionProgress: MotionProgress) => HeaderProps)`
- Update TabsContainer.tsx to pass MotionProgress from HeaderMotion.Header to the header installer
- Pass the resolved headerProps to the Screen header
